channel.description: Methods to setup Apache Superset To setup apache superset there are multiple ways. Please select appropriate way to set up from below Docker based installation Python PiPy based installation Installation on Windows Using WSL (Windows subsystem for linux as windows is directly not supported) Kubernetes (This documentation still does not have anything for Kubernetes. Will try and add soon)

item.title: Docker
item.description: Creating and deploying Apache Superset’s customized docker image To create custom docker image lets clone superset’s github Repo using following command. To reduce time and resources we will only clone till depth 1 and for this tutorial I am selecting 4.0 branch. git clone --depth=1 -b 4.0 https://github.com/apache/superset.git Let’s move to directory cd superset Create a dir I am calling it to_be_copied and create following directory structure in it - to_be_copied_into_assets - {your_project_}images - logo.

item.title: PiPy
item.description: SUPERSET PRODUCTION INSTALLATION Set up environment Update Ubuntu/Debian sudo apt update -y & sudo apt upgrade -y Install dependencies sudo apt-get install build-essential libssl-dev libffi-dev python3-dev python3-pip libsasl2-dev libldap2-dev default-libmysqlclient-dev python3.10-venv Create app directory for superset and dependencies sudo mkdir /app sudo chown user /app cd /app Create python environment mkdir superset cd superset python3 -m venv superset_env . superset_env/bin/activate pip install --upgrade setuptools pip Install Required dependencies pip install pillow pip install apache-superset Create superset config file and set environment variable touch superset_config.
